## What does this PR do? / 这个 PR 做了什么？




## Which issues does this PR resolve? / 这个 PR 解决了哪些问题？




## Checklist before merging / 合并前检查清单

Thank you for your contribution to the repository.  
Before submitting this PR, please make sure:  
感谢你对本仓库的贡献。  
在提交此 PR 前，请确认以下事项：  

- [ ] Your code builds clean without any errors or warnings  
      你的代码能够干净地构建，没有任何错误或警告  
- [ ] Your code follows [LeviLamina C++ Style Guide](https://github.com/LiteLDev/LeviLamina/wiki/CPP-Style-Guide)  
      你的代码遵循 [LeviLamina C++ 风格指南](https://github.com/LiteLDev/LeviLamina/wiki/CPP-Style-Guide)  
- [ ] You have tested all functions  
      你已经测试过所有功能  
- [ ] You have not used code without license  
      你没有使用没有许可证的代码  
- [ ] You have added statement for third-party code  
      你已经为第三方代码添加了说明  


## Note / 注意

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Before merging, please ensure that your branch history is clean, without unrelated commits.  
> If your branch contains commits not belonging to this PR, please use `git rebase` or `git cherrypick` to clean up the history.  
>
> 在合并前请确保您的分支历史记录干净，不要有无关的提交记录。  
> 如果您的分支有不属于该 PR 的提交记录，请使用 `git rebase` 或 `git cherrypick` 来清理您的分支历史记录。
